title: Leveraging Educational Technology for Learner-Centered Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematical concepts and awareness of fundamental instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Focuses on Developing Instructional Design Strategies Applicable to Mathematics Education for Pre-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design a 10-minute mathematics lesson by applying Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction.
Learners will be able to develop a lesson module on understanding middle school (grade 8) equations using Merrill’s First Principles of Instruction.
Learners will be able to design three learner-engagement-focused mathematics activities using digital tools (e.g., interactive whiteboards).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
